Introducing Aquafarm: our brand new interface for all things OCTO

07 October 2020

OCTOBRRR is humming along nicely as planned, our DeFi Dashboard is live at app.octo.fi, and it‚Äôs soon to be so much more‚Ä¶

Track your portfolio, find new investment opportunities, buy and sell directly, and in future, interface with oracles tentacles.

There‚Äôs loads of updates on the way and exclusive incentives for OCTO governance token holders.

Our Product Hunt (PH) launch went incredibly well thanks to the support of our amazing community.

We couldn‚Äôt help but include this video embed on PH after EllioTrades (no affiliation) mentioned us on his YouTube channel. üòÇ

We were pleasantly suprised to not only be FEATURED on the home page, but also achieving #5 Product of the Day!

You‚Äôre still welcome to upvote if you like‚Ä¶ The more upvotes we get, the better visibility we enjoy.

After such a warm welcome for our initial release, we‚Äôre excited to dive into the Aquafarm with you.

Here‚Äôs a quick rundown on the platform‚Äôs current features, what we‚Äôre working on now, and what‚Äôs planned for the future.

Aquafarm

First thing you‚Äôll see when visiting app.octo.fi is the login page to connect your wallet.

We allow you to connect with many of the popular wallets, including MetaMask, Ledger, Trezor, and thanks to Wallet Connect, everyone‚Äôs favourite mobile wallets too.

Dashboard

Once connected, you‚Äôll arrive at the dashboard where you get a simple overview of your account and its performance.

Keep track of the assets in your wallet, deposits, debts, and the different DeFi platforms you‚Äôve interacted with.

Invest

By clicking through to the Invest tab, you‚Äôll be presented with thousands of investment opportunities.

You can discover many different pools to participate in as a liquidity provider, or click on ‚ÄúInvest‚Äù and add your own.

Exchange

The final tab we‚Äôre announcing with this release is the Exchange, which provides easy access to Uniswap protocol.

If you are looking for our Interest Program, you can find the full details here, and it will soon be integrated with the new dapp.

What‚Äôs next?

OCTOBRRR is just getting started, here‚Äôs what we‚Äôre currenty working on bringing to Aquafarm:

  • History tab to display all of your Wallet transactions
  • Implementing TokenSet into the investment opportunies
  • Integrating our Snapshot.page governance into the UI
  • Dark / light mode for those DeFi late nights
  • Explore tab
  • First Beta version of Oracle aggregation (tentacles) as crypto market overview and price feed
  • Fiat on-ramp into DeFi

We will also soon release our roadmap for Octomask, the one and only browser plugin for ALL DeFi investment opportunities.

OctoMask will have you covered, whether on Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Tron, EOS, Bitcoin DefiChain, and we‚Äôll continue adding new chains (let‚Äôs make it to 8, the most octomized number of all üòÇ).

Get involved

Aquafarm is completely open source and is a work in progress. We invite you to follow along as we ‚Äòwork in public‚Äô on its rollout.

You can get involved by grabbing yourself some $OCTO, participating in governance (gasless and absolutely free), and providing feedback as part of our thriving community.

Oh, and don‚Äôt forget to save our poster (below)‚Ä¶

PS. None of this is Finantacle Advice. Do Your Octopus Research #DYOR.

The month of OCTOBRRR is finally here!

DYOR: Do Your Own Octopus Research üêô

Our Telegram Group is community-run, we use Snapshot for governance, and we are verified on Etherscan.

Total $OCTO supply is 800k, with 200k allocated to interest program, and 275k to project reserve.

200k sold to early backers ($0.18), and 125k to public via bonding curve distribution (to $1.08).

Read our blog, follow us on twitter, watch our github repos, subscribe to our Telegram Channel, join the community Telegram Group, send us an email, peruse the documentation, and subscribe to our mailing list below.
